code: import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let adjustInterval=undefined;function UpdateProduct(){const[watch,setWatch]=useState(0);const[started,setStarted]=useState(false);const startWatch=()=>{adjustInterval=setInterval(()=>{setWatch(watch=>watch+1);setStarted(true);},1000);};const stopWatch=()=>{clearInterval(adjustInterval);setStarted(false);};const resetWatch=()=>{setWatch(0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"UpdateProduct Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Stop Watch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:watch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:started,onClick:startWatch,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:stopWatch,children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:resetWatch,children:"Reset"})]});}export default UpdateProduct;
